thread.title: New York City police officer dies after being shot in head
thread.title_full: New York City police officer dies after being shot in head | NOLA.com

author: The Associated Press
title: New York City police officer dies after being shot in head
text:
NEW YORK â€” A New York City police officer has died after being shot while responding to a report of a man armed with a gun.
A source with direct knowledge of the investigation says a 33-year-old NYPD officer died after being shot in the head. He died at Harlem Hospital.
The shooting happened in Manhattan's East Harlem neighborhood on Tuesday night.
Police say another person was found with a gunshot wound to the leg several blocks away. It's unclear if that person is connected to the police officer's shooting. The person's condition is unknown.
A section of a busy parkway has been shut down near where the officer was shot.
Police haven't said what happened to the armed man.
